lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The barriers are crumbling anyway because state legislatures are agreeing to permit bank mergers across state lines within a region.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Behind the political deals was the larger question whether Congress would end or modify the half-century-old separation of commercial and investment banking or leave it alone.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The lobbies backed various amendments to protect their turf and a bill that rescues a federal deposit insurance fund for thrift institutions and puts a moratorium on any changes in banking law was passed and sent on to the full Senate.

lst.name: sentence
